Posts.EditableText:
I am unable to upload a demo game. It is in .quest format. I browse to it, click upload, and then after a few moments it just says "Failed to load file". I tried redoing the .quest file to no avail.

Seems to be specific to this one game, so I am uploading it here (renamed to .zip), in the hope someone can shed some light.
[attachment=0:33jslk6s]<!-- ia0 -->CombatDemo.zip<!-- ia0 -->[/attachment:33jslk6s]
Posts.HTML:
I am unable to upload a demo game. It is in .quest format. I browse to it, click upload, and then after a few moments it just says "Failed to load file". I tried redoing the .quest file to no avail.

Seems to be specific to this one game, so I am uploading it here (renamed to .zip), in the hope someone can shed some light.
CombatDemo.zip

Posts.EditableText:
It's because your game file doesn't load. When this happens, try seeing if it loads in Quest in the first place. This game generates the error:

Failed to load game.
The following errors occurred:
Error: Error adding script attribute 'equip' to element 'shield': Missing '}'
Posts.HTML:
It's because your game file doesn't load. When this happens, try seeing if it loads in Quest in the first place. This game generates the error:

Failed to load game.
The following errors occurred:
Error: Error adding script attribute 'equip' to element 'shield': Missing '}'

Posts.EditableText: Thanks, that was it. It did not object when I played from edit mode, so I assumed it was okay.
Posts.HTML: Thanks, that was it. It did not object when I played from edit mode, so I assumed it was okay.
